title: YOUTUBE CLONE
description: I built a front-end clone of YouTube, focusing on recreating the iconic video platform's user interface. This project showcases my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: DELISH
description: I built this website that helps people with recipes of different kinds of food from different country

title: MKCSS
description: A lightweight and customizable CSS framework designed to help developers build fast, responsive and beautiful websites. With a focus on simplicity, MkCSS provides a solid foundation for web development projects of all sizes.

title: MY PORTFOLIO
description: This is my portfolio, it's a modern website built with React, Bootstrap, and MkCSS. It's designed to be responsive and visually appealing, providing a great user experience across all devices.

title: LIFTING TOGETHER
description: This is a charity website created with React and Boostrap
